title: Sandy Hook Families Reach $73 Million Settlement With Gun Maker Remington - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Sandy Hook Families Reach $73 Million Settlement With Gun Maker Remington  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Sandy Hook Families Reach Settlement With Gunmaker Remington  The New York Times
  3. Gunmaker Remington Reaches Settlement Agreement With Families Of Sandy Hook Victims  NBC News
  4. $73 settlement reached between Sandy Hook families, maker of weapon used in the school shooting  WFSB
  5. Sandy Hook lawsuit: Gun manufacturer Remington reaches settlement with victims' families  Fox Business
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Remington has reached an agreement to settle claims in a case alleging  its marketing practices were in part responsible for the Sandy Hook school shooting, in a rare victory for plaintiffs suing gun makers.
